title: Tele2 - Wikipedia
snippet: In November 2018, Tele2 was merged with telecom operator Com Hem, which delivered, among other things, TV, broadband and telephony.

title: Tele2 and Com Hem merger - Tele2
snippet: Com Hem Holding was dissolved and all of its assets and liabilities were transferred to Tele2.

title: TELE2 AND COM HEM COMBINING TO CREATE LEADING INTEGRATED CONNECTIVITY PROVIDER - Tele2 play
snippet: It is expected that upon completion ... ... Pursuant to the Merger Plan, Com Hemâ€™s shareholders will receive approximately 26.9 percent economic ownership in Enlarged Tele2....

title: Tele2 2025 Company Profile: Stock Performance & Earnings | PitchBook
snippet: Tele2 was a pure mobile operator until 2018 when it acquired Com Hem, Sweden's largest cable company. Tele2 is also present in the Baltic markets, where it runs a pure mobile business.

title: Sec
snippet: I hope you enjoy the longest-ever ... the board of Com Hem to merge Com Hem into Tele2 for a consideration that is roughly equivalent to 75% in Tele2 shares and 25% in cash....
